# This file is automatically generated from cmake.toml - DO NOT EDIT
# See https://github.com/build-cpp/cmkr for more information

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)

# Enable support for MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)

set(CMAKE_MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
if(CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR STREQUAL CMAKE_BINARY_DIR)
	message(FATAL_ERROR "In-tree builds are not supported. Run CMake from a separate directory: cmake -B build")
endif()

# Regenerate CMakeLists.txt automatically in the root project
set(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT OFF)
if(CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR STREQUAL CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR)
	set(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT ON)

	# Bootstrap cmkr
	include("cmake/cmkr.cmake" OPTIONAL RESULT_VARIABLE CMKR_INCLUDE_RESULT)
	if(CMKR_INCLUDE_RESULT)
		cmkr()
	endif()

	# Enable folder support
	set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY USE_FOLDERS ON)
endif()

# Create a configure-time dependency on cmake.toml to improve IDE support
if(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT)
	configure_file(cmake.toml cmake.toml COPYONLY)
endif()

project(cmkr-qt6-msvc-static-template
	VERSION
		0.1.0
	DESCRIPTION
		cmkr-qt6-msvc-static-template
)

include("cmake/Qt5Helpers.cmake")

# Packages
find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED
	COMPONENTS
		Widgets
		Core5Compat
)

# Target cmkr-qt6-msvc-static-template
set(CMKR_TARGET cmkr-qt6-msvc-static-template)
set(cmkr-qt6-msvc-static-template_SOURCES "")

list(APPEND cmkr-qt6-msvc-static-template_SOURCES
	"src/main.cpp"
	"src/MainWindow.cpp"
	"src/MainWindow.h"
	"src/MainWindow.ui"
	"src/resource.qrc"
)

list(APPEND cmkr-qt6-msvc-static-template_SOURCES
	cmake.toml
)

set(CMKR_SOURCES ${cmkr-qt6-msvc-static-template_SOURCES})
add_executable(cmkr-qt6-msvc-static-template)

if(cmkr-qt6-msvc-static-template_SOURCES)
	target_sources(cmkr-qt6-msvc-static-template PRIVATE ${cmkr-qt6-msvc-static-template_SOURCES})
endif()

get_directory_property(CMKR_VS_STARTUP_PROJECT DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR} DEFINITION VS_STARTUP_PROJECT)
if(NOT CMKR_VS_STARTUP_PROJECT)
	set_property(DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR} PROPERTY VS_STARTUP_PROJECT cmkr-qt6-msvc-static-template)
endif()

source_group(TREE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} FILES ${cmkr-qt6-msvc-static-template_SOURCES})

target_link_libraries(cmkr-qt6-msvc-static-template PRIVATE
	Qt6::Widgets
	Qt6::Core5Compat
)

if(MSVC) # msvc
	target_link_options(cmkr-qt6-msvc-static-template PRIVATE
		"/SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS"
	)
endif()

# Enable Qt moc/rrc/uic support
target_qt(${CMKR_TARGET})

unset(CMKR_TARGET)
unset(CMKR_SOURCES)

install(
	TARGETS
		cmkr-qt6-msvc-static-template
	DESTINATION
		bin
	COMPONENT
		cmkr-qt6-msvc-static-template
)
